Trade/Device Name(s): Audit® MicroCV™ Beta-Hydroxybutyric Acid Linearity Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Audit® MicroCV™ Beta-Hydroxybutyric Acid Linearity Set as an assayed human serum quality control material for linearity assessment.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to simulate human serum for determining linearity, calibration verification, and reportable range for Beta-Hydroxybutyric Acid in quantitative assays, for in vitro diagnostic use only.
